name: Coupon Plugin
author: CouponPlugin.io

sections.description:
A WordPress Coupon Plugin that creates a coupon and deal box for the affiliate marketers and bloggers. One can show a coupon with a shortcode.

FEATURES OF COUPON PLUGIN LITE

• 100% Responsive And Attractive Design.
• Hide Coupon Functionality.
• Store Image Functionality.
• Coupon Expiry Date With Time.
• Inbuilt Affiliate Link System.
• Stylish Popular Coupon Strip
• List A Coupon With A Shortcode
• Categorized Coupon With Store/Category

FEATURES OF COUPON PLUGIN PRO

• List Coupon By Category With A Shortcode.
• List Coupon By Store With A Shortcode.
• Affiliate Link Cloaking
• Coupon Voting
• Coupon Share(Facebook & Twitter)
• Coupon Popup
• Coupon Click To Copy
• Coupon Shortcode Grid Look
• Insert Shortcode From Editor

Running a coupon website on WordPress that is SEO Friendly and makes sales was never so easy. However, there were some themes that let you create a coupon site on WP in minutes.
But, all of them lacks the essential features that a coupon website needs. They were neither user-friendly nor search engine friendly which makes it very hard to build a coupon website on WordPress. Moreover, they don’t look good, visually. That makes it hard to generate sales as the user feels it complicated to use a site that is built on such themes and plugins.
So, here we have developed a coupon plugin for WordPress which will help you to make most of your existing users. It will make it easy to generate sales and will also help you rank your site higher on search engines as we have developed plugin by keeping all the SEO standards in mind.
The Plugin is backed will all the feature that a coupon site needs, you can simply install the plugin and can turn your site into a full-fledged coupon website within minutes. Moreover, this WordPress coupon plugin supports all the WordPress themes so you can use any theme of your choice and it will turn it into a coupon theme which will help you build a good user base of online shoppers who loves to save while shopping online.
Check our pro version for more features.
From a normal visitor’s perspective, it is very important to have a site that is easy to navigate so the plugin introduces a very simple interface with a highly customisable look that allows you to turn your site into the way you want. The pro version gives you access to additional features which you will not see with any other coupon plugin or theme.
It includes automatic affiliate URL Cloaking and adding a Nofollow tag to them, which will help you in ranking better in SERP. Along with that, it allows you to show coupons by category or store so you can show a bunch of coupons by single shortcode.

WordPress Coupon Plugin Features

Show Coupons By Store Or Category

It’s a boring task to add coupons one by one so in this coupon plugin, we have introduced a special feature that will allow you to show all the coupons for specific store or category by inserting a single shortcode in the content. You can simply add a single shortcode into your content and it will start showing all the coupons you have for that store. You can also control the count of coupons if you want.

Automatic Affiliate Link Cloaking

Running a coupon site which doesn’t get traffic, is it makes sense? For getting good traffic it is necessary to have good rankings on Google. According to Google, having a lot of Dofollow outbound links are not good for SEO and it doesn’t have negative effects on SEO.
So, to solve that problem so your site can rank higher in google we have added an automatic link cloaking system which will make your affiliate links look better and will help in SEO as well. Also, the plugin has added Nofollow tag to all the outbound links so you don’t lose any of link juice.

“Click to Copy” For Coupon Codes

It’s important to turn your visitors into your users. If you also want to make that happen then it is necessary to serve them best they need. You need to provide them compact and easy UI so they can return back to your site.
And if it is very hard to copy a coupon for a visitor then, I’m definitely sure that it will be a bad experience for the user and he will not dare to come back to your site. So, with intentions to make it easy to access your site for users we have added simple “Click to Copy” button which let users copy the coupon by a single click.

Easy Social Media Sharing For Coupons

Social media is one of the best ways to get traffic. In fact, it also has an impact on organic traffic as Google consider social signals as a ranking factor. So, in this plugin, we have added a direct option for social media sharing so users can easily share coupons on facebook and twitter.

Coupon Voting

In the coupon plugin, the user can easily vote on the coupon if they work for them or not. It will help you to take down all the coupons which don’t work for visitors. It will help you to show working coupons only which will increase the trust of visitor and no wonder if they become your regular visitor.
For most of the users even free version is enough but if you are willing to expand at a bigger level then I will recommend you to go with pro version. As that will make it easy to manage and will help you in SEO as well as that have some additional SEO Benefits.

Create A Coupon Demo

Show A Coupon Within A Post Demo
sections.installation:
Installation Process 1:

  1. Download the plugin from WordPress plugin repository and unzip all the files from coupon-lite.zip into a folder.
  2. Upload the folder within the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins ‘ menu in WordPress.

Installation Process 2 :

  1. In your WordPress dashboard, go to Add New under Plugins section.
  2. Search for ‘Coupon Plugin’
  3. Click on ‘Coupon Plugin’.
  4. Click on Install button and activate the plugin.

Version 1.0.0

Initial Plugin Release
Version 1.0.1
Button Click Fixed
Some Minor Css Bug Fixed

Version 1.0.2
Readmore Function Included
Some Minor Css Bug Fixed

Version 1.0.3
Button Color Can Be changed.
Mobile View Fixed

Version 1.0.4
Js and Css File minified

Version 1.0.7
Compatible with 4.9

Version 1.0.8
Compatible with 4.9.2
Setting Page is not getting shown on php version below 5.4
Expiry Date Time Fixed
And More Improvements

Version 1.0.9
Format Of Expiry Date Fixed

Version 1.1.0
Compatible with WordPress 5 and up
Coupon click popup error fixed for chrome

Version 1.1.1
Minor bug fixes

Version 1.1.2
Minor bug fixes

version 1.1.3
coupon popup block fixed

version 1.1.4
minor bug fixed
